DOC.brief_summary: Liposuction surgery common , yet animal limited human data suggest fat return remove . This study design 1-year randomized-controlled trial suction lipectomy versus intervention determine adipose tissue defend , determine anatomic pattern redistribution .
DOC.brief_title: Mechanisms Defending Fat Mass Humans After Lipectomy
DOC.detailed_description: Specific Aims : 1 . To determine suction lipectomy fail modify regional and/or total body fat three year . 2 . To determine expression candidate gene predict and/or relates subcutaneous adipose tissue growth depletion subcutaneous adipose tissue suction lipectomy . 3 . To examine adipose tissue suction lipectomy uncover novel gene expression predict and/or relates subcutaneous adipose tissue growth depletion subcutaneous suction lipectomy .
DOC.criteria: Eligible premenopausal woman age 1850 year ; BMI 2227 kg/m2 subject maximum body weight ; Weight stable least 3 month ( define < 57 % change maximum weight 36 month ) ; Nonsmokers . Any history glucose intolerance , dyslipidemia , liver , kidney cardiac disease , hypertension , cancer chronic debilitate disorder might interfere 'normal ' lifestyle , e.g . nutrition , physical activity ; Thyroid hormone replacement abnormal thyroid stimulate hormone ( TSH ) result ; Use oral contraceptive subject did/could remain therapy throughout study participation . Reducedobese , defined history : 1. obesity weight loss > 10 % maximum body weight , 2. liposuction gastric bypass surgery ; Evidence body dysmorphic disorder ; Taking sex steroid , glucocorticoid , medication affect carbohydrate lipid metabolism ; Hematocrit , hemoglobin , white blood cell count ( WBC ) , platelet count , liver renal function test normal range ; Fasting plasma glucose > 110 mg/dL ; Triglycerides > 200 mg/dL ; High density lipoprotein ( HDL ) cholesterol < 35 mg/dL ; Low density lipoprotein ( LDL ) cholesterol > 160 mg/dL ; Proteinuria ; Blood pressure > 140/90 mm/Hg ; Electrocardiogram abnormality ; History claustrophobia ; Placement metal implants* History internal metal fragments* *Were evaluate radiologist prior study determination*
